name: rubble
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the piles of broken stone and bricks, etc. that are left when a building falls down or is destroyed: The bomb reduced the house to rubble.
Chris6/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
small pieces of stone or rock used for building
